_sText:
Re-make of surf_xiv

Credits: (also in map)

Original idea from smoOth
area 4 is a remake of an area in the original map
area 5 is a remake of an area in the original map
area 10 is a remake of surf_snipers_island a map originally made by loller dan

thanks to:

Zalos for the ctf prefab and for making CP a surf style
Uninamer / SKAR for making area 6
Rumpelbude for the skybox
Icecreamlock for custom textures used in area 4

Preliminary testers (before online tests)
Uninamer
Razzle Dazzle
LambdA
Matanza

Dragon rock clan for hosting the many beta tests

/credits

How to play this map, or what makes it different from xiv

In xiv one person chooses the map that is gone to, but in xii everyone gets a vote
the way this works is as follows:
In the main spawn room there are 12 pictures representing each of the 12 maps
each picture has a # above it and a small room below it
to vote for a area a person simply walks into the small room below said areas picture

after 20 seconds the map tally's all the votes and goes to the map with the most votes

this is also in the main spawn room, so if you put this map on your server people will figure out what to do.


A brief explanation of each area:
Area 1:
Continues surf
Requires a lot of skill to beat

Area 2:
Capture The Flag style surf

Area 3:
Capture point style surf

Area 4:
Block fort, this is a remake of the block fort are in xiv

Area 5:
Like the windows area in xiv, you fall to gain speed
easy skill surf

Area 6:
Ice Skate with some surf able areas

Area 7:
battle / free style surf

Area 8:
Hard skill surf
re-make of my map surf_annoyance, only with 3 levels

Area 9:
Battle surf

Area 10:
Surf_Snipers Island remake (really its own kind of surf)

Area 11:
scouts & knifes surf

area 12:
battle surf

well there you have it

surf_XII_v1

Enjoy!
